name: Black Bubba
description: Black Bubba is an indica-dominant cross of Bubba Kush and Black Russian. The resulting buds carry a sweet aroma with subtle fruit notes that produce earthy flavors of hash and pine. The relaxing indica effects calm body pains, stimulate the appetite, and are known to sedate the body into a state of couchlock.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Sleepy, Tingly, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Seizures, Depression, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
